thread.title: Stream R. Stevie Moore & Jason Falkner Make It Be
thread.title_full: Stream R. Stevie Moore & Jason Falkner Make It Be

author: Stereogum
title: Stream R. Stevie Moore & Jason Falkner Make It Be
text: R. Stevie Moore is a lo-fi legend whose catalog includes more than 400 albums over the course of 49 years. Here's one more: The prolific DIY icon has teamed with power-pop cult favorite Jason Falkner for an album that paints Moore's music with a sleek neon crunch. Make It Be is more vibrantly alive than … More »
